oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Words and Music - 2008
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Words and Music program held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 29, 2008. Hosted by Trisha Yearwood.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Trisha Yearwood;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Professional songwriters with student co-writers performing songs they have written together during the course of the school year.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Yearwood, Trisha
